title: DDFP 406: Week 11 review & "Pie-Off IV"
itunes:title: DDFP 406: Week 11 review & "Pie-Off IV"
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "The Goth Kid" Gothard to recap Monday Night Football, discuss their college and NFL final four contenders and of course, their favorite Christmas carols. Then, Shek kicks off "Pie-Off IV," as he judges the pies baked by Handsome Hank, Marc Istook, Dan Hanzus and the rest of the NFL Media contestants in the biggest "Pie-Off" in the show's history.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
